answerText: Baku[10] Baku is the capital of this former Soviet republic, which owns the exclave of Nakhchivan.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 5 | 11 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: Off the coast of this city is a town built on oil rigs called Neft Daslari. [10] Name this national capital, which is the largest city on the Caspian Sea and its primary port. It is located on the Absheron peninsula.
